Layout/ParameterAlignment.description:
Description

Align the parameters of a method definition if they span more than one line.
Layout/ParameterAlignment.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: with_first_parameter (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['with_first_parameter', 'with_fixed_indentation'] (type: list)
IndentationWidth: None (type: NoneType)
